mapper.sql: id, title, business_type, user_type, user_id, user_name, phone, request_url, request_method, request_params, request_result, client_ip, status, create_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO operation_log ( id, title, business_type, user_type, user_id, user_name, phone, request_url, request_method, request_params, request_result, client_ip, status, create_time ) VALUES
( #{entity.id}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.userType}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.requestUrl}, #{entity.requestMethod}, #{entity.requestParams}, #{entity.requestResult}, #{entity.clientIp}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime} )

INSERT INTO operation_log ( id, title, business_type, user_type, user_id, user_name, phone, request_url, request_method, request_params, request_result, client_ip, status, create_time ) VALUES
( #{entity.id}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.userType}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.requestUrl}, #{entity.requestMethod}, #{entity.requestParams}, #{entity.requestResult}, #{entity.clientIp}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = VALUES(title), business_type = VALUES(business_type), user_type = VALUES(user_type), user_id = VALUES(user_id), user_name = VALUES(user_name), phone = VALUES(phone), request_url = VALUES(request_url), request_method = VALUES(request_method), request_params = VALUES(request_params), request_result = VALUES(request_result), client_ip = VALUES(client_ip), status = VALUES(status), create_time = VALUES(create_time)
